channel.title: Life on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: Xbase
item.description: It’s a Twitter Bookmark Manager for professional users.

item.title: LaptopFriendly
item.description: Find a laptop friendly place to work

item.title: Coffitivity
item.description: a rather simple but useful coffee shop noise library; premium has more three more soundtracks; elegant UI; scientific research powered

item.title: Noizio
item.description: a handy white noise tool that stays in your Mac status bar.

item.title: Noisli
item.description: free mixing of multiple tracks (which is similar to Soundrown but with much better UI). Users can save a customized setting for later use.

item.title: Rainy Mood
item.description: rainy day rainy mood, simple but with excellent white noise; a new beautiful soundtrack each day

item.title: Ten Rules Plosone
item.description: Series of quick “Ten Simple Rules” articles for research scientists to manage challenges in their careers. Number of articles are life-science specific, but rest the of articles are general enough for any researcher.
